# Curse of Ill Fortune, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** Enemies in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 56

This spell functions like *[[Curse of Ill Fortune (Spell)|curse of ill fortune]],* except that it affects multiple enemies.
